DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study First Awareness Occurrence Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Other occurrence of first awareness of clinical study specified when not applicable to other listed sources.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to when person first became aware of the clinical study

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Knowing that something exists, or having knowledge or experience of a particular thing; having special interest in or experience of something and so being well informed of what is happening in that subject at the present time.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Knowing that something exists, or having knowledge or experience of a particular thing; having special interest in or experience of something and so being well informed of what is happening in that subject at the present time.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
